com.netscape.cmstools

Class PrettyPrintCert

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netscape.cmstools.PrettyPrintCert

  • public class PrettyPrintCert
extends java.lang.Object
    The PrettyPrintCert class is a utility program designed to "pretty print" a certificate. It assumes that the name of a data file is passed to the program via the command line, and that the contents contain a certificate encoded in an ASCII BASE 64 format. Note that the data file may contain an optional "-----BEGIN" header and/or an optional "-----END" trailer.

    The program may be invoked as follows: 

    
      PrettyPrintCert <input filename> [output filename]

      NOTE:  <input filename>   must contain an ASCII
                                BASE 64 encoded certificate

             <output filename>  contains a certificate displayed
                                in a "pretty print" ASCII format
    Version:
    $Revision$, $Date$
